Description:



Warhammer 40.000 Fans certainly well aware of the board game Space Hulk, in which the squad had to clean up the terminator skeleton huge derelict spaceship from Genestealer entrenched in it. Also in 1993 came the computer game of the same name. passed since almost 20 years, and is a great reason to release a new game based on the old. Story and gameplay Space Hulk (2013) practically not depart from the canon: under your command will be four terminators Blood Angels, and the aim of the game will ship from cleansing imperial colony Genestealer, are very similar to the famous "Alien." genre of turn-based 3D-strategies many players know from X-COM: Enemy Unkown, and control by Games Workshop Full Control will release a decent game..
